nodes.title: Check JAVA_HOME before java.home to locate JDK home
Fix compilerPlugins docs & tweak addScalacArgs docs
Minor change to use the latest stable jline version
Ask java compiler to generate 1.6 compatible bytecode
Workaround for Scala-to-Java-dependencies when compiling with sendJavaToScalac=false
Upgrade maven-site-plugin in ITs to 3.3 so that ITs pass with Maven 3.3.3
Improve test failure message for wrong JDK (> 7).
Update scala home example in README.md
Make it possible to deactivate `integration-tests` profile
Add a Bitdeli Badge to README
Use proper version of jline for supporting scala:console goal with Scala 2.11
Fixes for classpath handling for scala script.
Allow customization of classifier of scaladoc jar
Log only to INFO level when no sources to compile found
Use -C instead of -J for passing javac options to zinc
Upgrade to Maven 3.0.4 and up the version number
Consistently use camel case for expression names
zinc: changed from colon to platform-specific path separator
The patch for issue #93 - Don't create 'target' directory if scala sources are absent.
Fix continuous compile with incremental recompilation
Add javac args for incremental compiler
Use Maven 3.0 toolchain API to configure a specific JDK to build with
Issue 78: Make classloader used to run script contain dependencies
override default qdox version (1.6.3 -> 1.11) in docck plugin to prevent
Fix to issue 31: scala:script fails on Windows
Ability to specify Scala installation directory
Minor Fixes and a more flexible cctest goal
Allow to omit -target and -source options in javac
Partial revert of e2ce8b3759a581f32593a56bac100a1a51a68966 protected => private API changes for bloop/other 3rd party apps
DO NOT MERGE Enable incremental mode by default
Issue #318 [Multi-Language][Kotlin][Scala] Add directories to classpath to allow cross language compilation
Add compiler plugins to scaladoc execution
Migrated javadoc-style annotation to Maven Plugin Annotations.
Bump org.apache.maven:maven-compat, org.apache.maven:maven-plugin-api, org.apache.maven:maven-core and org.apache.maven:maven-model
move to GitHub action from Travis
support release compiler options for javac and scalac
Update Zinc information in documentation site
Support <classpath> in doc in the same way as for compile
Remove log-level prefix from incoming Sbt log messages
Issue-379: Can't use user property outputDir from the command line
